extension.name: Events Booking - Events By Location
extension.author: Tuan Pham Ngoc
extension.description: This module is used to display locations in Event Booking Extension so that users can browse events by location

field.name: number_locations
field.label: Number Locations
field.description: Number of locations to be showed on the module

field.name: show_number_events
field.label: Show number events
field.description: If set to Yes, we will show number of events next to the location

field.name: hide_location_without_events
field.label: Hide Location Without Events
field.description: If set to Yes, locations without events available will be hided from the module
